name: @rinze repositories
body:
# Who am I

Biomedical engineer with a PhD (soon) obtained developing automatic methods for dynamic imaging segmentation (clustering, in plain English). Also interested in machine learning and data analysis, these down here are my personal projects.

# What have I done with my spare time

In inverse chronological order.

* [rank-es](https://github.com/rinze/rank-es). Takes links from the front page / pending page from meneame.net (a digg/reddit clone in Spanish) and re-ranks them using the likes and shares scores from Facebook and Twitter. Effectively, it builds a news aggregator site without users. You can see it action at http://rank-es.appspot.com/.
* [kiva-secular](https://github.com/rinze/kiva_secular). Filters (Kiva)[http://kiva.org] field partners according to their secular and social scores computed by (this team)[http://www.kiva.org/team/atheists]. Results refreshed hourly at http://www.eurielec.etsit.upm.es/~chema/kiva_secular/ when the university servers are up. 

# Contact me

I'm @rinze on Github and Twitter. Feel free to drop me a line with your thoughts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
